# hunterhodnett.ai

> Hunter Hodnett is a software engineer. This is his personal website featuring his bio, blog posts, and media appearances.

## Site Contents

- [Homepage](https://hunterhodnett.ai/): Hero bio, skills, and featured content
- [Blog](https://hunterhodnett.ai/blog/): Technical blog posts and articles
- [Media](https://hunterhodnett.ai/media/): Conference talks, podcast appearances, and interviews

## About Hunter

<!-- TODO: Replace with LinkedIn data -->
Hunter Hodnett is a software engineer based in the United States. He builds software products and writes about technology.
